alert.note: Alert for Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 17 at 8:14PM EST until January 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of six inches are possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of western Maryland, western Virginia and eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes on Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...|Snow will overspread the area Thursday night and continue through Friday before giving way to a period of upslope snow showers Friday evening into Friday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton
